item.title: Carpentry with Dougo
item.description: Watch Dougo in action as he tackles carpentry projects, demonstrating woodworking skills, techniques, and craftsmanship.

media:content.media:title: Carpentry with Dougo
media:content.media:description: Watch Dougo in action as he tackles carpentry projects, demonstrating woodworking skills, techniques, and craftsmanship.

item.title: Underway with Planting – Mud Plugs the Planter
item.description: See a planting session interrupted as mud clogs the planter, highlighting real farming challenges, problem-solving, and fieldwork in action.

item.title: Before the Planter Leaves – Clearing Everything
item.description: Watch the process of removing all attachments before the planter moves, highlighting preparation, safety, and efficient farm equipment handling.

item.title: Combine Wash Disaster – Nothing Worked Today
item.description: See the challenges faced during a combine wash, where nothing goes as planned, highlighting real farm work struggles and problem-solving in action.

item.title: The Quads Are an Absolute Disaster
item.description: Watch as the quads face unexpected problems, showcasing maintenance challenges, repairs, and the realities of handling off-road vehicles.

item.title: Auction Time – What Will We Buy?
item.description: Join the excitement of auction day as we explore items up for bid, make purchases, and reveal the surprises along the way.

item.title: Auction Time – What Will We Buy
item.description: Experience the thrill of auction day as we bid on items, discover potential treasures, and see what ends up coming home.

item.title: 5” of Rain Really Makes a Mess!
item.description: After 5 inches of rain, the farm faces muddy fields and challenges, showing how heavy rainfall impacts work, equipment, and daily farm operations.

item.title: Prepping 1965 Grain Truck for Sale
item.description: Getting a 1965 grain truck ready for sale, covering cleaning, repairs, and restoration to maximize value and appeal for potential buyers.

item.title: Everything Takes Longer in the Winter
item.description: A humorous and relatable look at how winter slows down everyday tasks, from farming to chores, highlighting patience, challenges, and seasonal adjustments.

item.title: Found the Perfect Job for a 9RX
item.description: Discovering the ideal task for a 9RX tractor, showcasing its capabilities, power, and efficiency in handling demanding farm work.

item.title: The 8520 Tractor Is Heading to Iowa
item.description: The 8520 tractor is en route to Iowa, highlighting the excitement of a new addition, transport logistics, and its anticipated impact on farm operations.

item.title: Time for It to Work!
item.description: A project or piece of equipment is finally put to the test, showcasing its performance, functionality, and the results of preparation and effort.

item.title: The Fields Are Still Wet
item.description: Checking wet fields after recent rain, highlighting the challenges of farming in soggy conditions and how it affects planting, harvesting, or equipment use.

item.title: Cold Weather Causes Grain Leg Problems
item.description: Freezing temperatures create challenges with grain leg equipment, showing the impact of cold weather on farm operations and how issues are managed.

item.title: What Happened to My Combine?
item.description: A farm machinery issue leaves a combine inoperable, exploring the problem, possible causes, and steps to get it running again.

item.title: Snow Is Coming and the Farm Isn’t Ready
item.description: Unexpected snow threatens the farm, showing the urgent preparations and challenges farmers face when weather catches them off guard.

item.title: This Machine Has 9,000 Hours
item.description: A look at a hardworking machine with 9,000 hours of use. See how it performs after years of heavy-duty work and what keeps it running strong.

item.title: We Should Never Have Started This Project
item.description: A farming project takes an unexpected turn. Watch as challenges unfold, showing the tough and unpredictable side of agriculture work.

item.title: Panic Sets In: Time to Farm
item.description: Farmers rush to prepare fields and equipment as the season begins. A glimpse into the urgency and fast-paced work of modern farming.
